body: The physical nature of the objects in the solar system; the earth's atmosphere, ionosphere, radiation belts, magnetosphere, and orbital mechanics.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: E E 330 or PHYS 400)(Additional Attributes: Cross-listed with: AERSP 492)
contentHtml: The physical nature of the objects in the solar system; the earth's atmosphere, ionosphere, radiation belts, magnetosphere, and orbital mechanics.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: E E 330 or PHYS 400)(Additional Attributes: Cross-listed with: AERSP 492)
title: EE 472: Space Astronomy and Introduction to Space Science
